conversations.body_text: Hi xaritos marnieros,  ​  We sincerely apologize that this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to demand far exceeding our projections. We will arrange for shipment within the next two days and deeply regret this delay.

You should not accept the order if you are out of stock anyway refund me the 25 euros for the supposedly 7 days shipping
